triples.name: Evolutionary game theory
triples.relevance: The paper is a comprehensive survey of the field of evolutionary game theory and its interdisciplinary applications.

triples.name: Evolution
triples.relevance: Evolutionary game theory fundamentally relies on models of evolution and natural selection.

triples.name: Evolutionary biology
triples.relevance: The paper discusses how evolutionary game theory researchers move into evolutionary biology and related disciplines.

triples.name: Ecology
triples.relevance: Ecology is one of the fields where evolutionary game theory concepts are applied and studied.

triples.name: Cooperation
triples.relevance: Cooperation is explicitly mentioned as one of the few very popular issues in evolutionary game theory research.

triples.name: Reciprocity
triples.relevance: Reciprocity is identified in the paper as an insight that is rediscovered in different fields under different labels.

triples.name: Spatial ecology
triples.relevance: Spatial structure is explicitly discussed as an insight treated differently across various fields in evolutionary game theory.

triples.name: Algorithm
triples.relevance: Computer scientists use algorithms to explore evolutionary game theory and simulate interactions between machines.
